text: The Runaways were an American all-girl rock band. They were formed in Los Angeles in 1975 and split in 1979. They were not a major success in the United States. They were popular in some other countries Like Japan. Their signature song was "Cherry Bomb". Cherie Currie and Joan Jett were part of the group. title: The Runaways
